content: Hi. Is there any good viedo/PDF or other kind of detailed tutorial on how to create profiles using Forge? I have tried using it and able to create structuredDefinition for my extension. but still if there is some good documentation which can help and expedite process of using Forge. like would want to try, creating differential and snapshot modes etc.

Hi @Aditya Joshi my colleague Ardon has updated the online Forge documentation:
http://docs.simplifier.net/projects/forge-docs/en/latest/
And here you can find some slide decks on profiling in Forge:
http://fhir.furore.com/Education
Also, I recommend that you subscribe to the conformance stream on Zulip, as it is focused on profiling. Feel free to ask questions to the community, usually you quickly get a good response. My colleagues and myself are frequently monitoring the chat and can help you out with questions about the application.
Happy profiling!
Thanks Michel, it helps. thanks for pointing towards new documentation and conformance stream on Zuplip. Sure, I would post questions if in trouble using Forge. Thanks again.
